Do you trust pakistan for a huge deals?See what happened with users in the past like Vod and other self-proclaimed internet detective turns out to be scammers. comments.author: crwth
comments.body: From what I saw from the posts, you are buying positive reviews. I see here that you are incentivizing to put reviews on your service/site that you have, which I think is okay but demanding "positive" reviews instead of their honest opinion of your service makes it somewhat of a "bribe" situation. That's going to be untrustworthy actions. It should be honest and just really reviewing the service and unbiased. What do you think about this, OP?Quote from: dhru9 on September 20, 2022, 06:18:06 PMI don't need anything from this forum so I say what I think. I don't do signature campaigns and deas here and I am non bias opinion here. How is that unbiased opinion when you are not basing your accusation on anything tangible or real? You are basing on ethnicity and comparing average wage earners 300 USD a month equal to a scam already?
